itemInfo.itemDesc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Agerian Gloves\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Agerian Gloves of Duress, Agerian Gloves

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Soft Hide
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Translucent Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Translucent Crystals found near Goblin Cave.

item.name: Agerian Gloves
item.desc: Specially made armor for elite members of militia\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Ultimate Agerian Gloves
item.desc: Agerian Gloves with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Agerian Gloves
